name: Greggmas Saga: July's Rebuke
description:
Christmas in July is here!

Welcome, wanderer, to this year's Christmas in July installment! Who can say no to a $99 Panasonic Blu-ray player? How about a 32" LCD TV for only $299? An LG 42" HDTV for $489? Sounds like another year of great savings, right? Well it would be if it weren't for those pesky zombified electronics retailers running amok. Who could have caused such a corporate conundrum? Perhaps you will find out...

Bullet Hell Gameplay

Dodge, Dip, Duck, Dive, and Dodge your way to victory against waves of minions and bosses. Slow time by activating July Mode to weave throughout a bullet-filled screen. Fire a Deal Shot when you're in a pinch to get out of sticky situations. Hit enemies with your July-grown snowballs to recharge your energy.

Controls

Left Mouse / Spacebar- Activate July Mode to slow time!

Right Mouse / V- Fire a Deal Shot which clears projectiles and deals extra damage!

Esc- Pause Game
